name: shop-it
description:
Project to teach children meaningful spending practices with limited amounts of money.

The player is running a grocery errand and given a grocery list from "mother". They go through different stores such as a supermarket or a bakery to buy and collect food and gifts the mother asked.

The player can buy more stuff than in order to satisfy their own need. However, they need to make sure they buy all the items from the errand list.

Made with Vue.js in team of four developers (https://github.com/einyan03/Shopit).

In order to play it, click and enter the webpage.
